attributes.action: Make London an Independent City State
attributes.additional_details: London, as the capital city of England, is a vibrant city full of different cultures, and this multicultural culture, has now become the culture of Londoners. The people of London do not want to be restrained by the wishes of the rest of England who clearly have opposite interests.
attributes.background:
Brexit won in the recent EU referendum by 51.9%, however London was 60% remain. A large difference from the rest of England. London is completely different from the rest of England. 

If London becomes an city state, they can embrace their unique culture. Don't be held back by the rest of England.
